issue.title: 3.0 AR escape problems

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
I've fixed a few AR bugs tonight for you @narbg so its your turn to get this one:

```
A Database Error Occurred
Error Number: 1146

Table 'pyrocms.default_`default_data_field_assignments' doesn't exist

SELECT `default_data_field_assignments`.`id` as `sign_id`, `default_data_streams`.*, `default_data_field_assignments`.*, `default_data_fields`.* FROM `default_data_streams` JOIN `default_``default_data_field_assignments` ON `default_data_streams`.`id`=`default_data_field_assignments`.`stream_id` JOIN `default_``default_data_fields` ON `default_data_fields`.`id`=`default_data_field_assignments`.`field_id` WHERE `default_data_streams`.`id` = '1' ORDER BY `default_data_field_assignments`.`sort_order` asc

Filename: /Users/phil/src/pyrocms/modules/streams_core/models/streams_m.php

Line Number: 563
```

Coming from code like this:

```
    $this->db->where(STREAMS_TABLE.'.id', $stream_id);
    $this->db->join(ASSIGN_TABLE, STREAMS_TABLE.'.id='.ASSIGN_TABLE.'.stream_id');
    $this->db->join(FIELDS_TABLE, FIELDS_TABLE.'.id='.ASSIGN_TABLE.'.field_id');

    $obj = $this->db->get(STREAMS_TABLE);
```

Those constant values are all clear of the prefix:

Debug #1 of 3: 
string 'data_field_assignments' (length=22)

Debug #2 of 3: 
string 'data_streams' (length=12)

Debug #3 of 3: 
string 'data_fields' (length=11)

Fix 3.0 AR please!

issue.title: Added Session driver with native PHP sessions and original-flavor CI cookie sessions

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
This is a refactoring of the original CodeIgniter Session library as a driver library. It adds a native PHP session driver for those who prefer that route, while keeping all the neat features of original CI sessions and a couple new features suggested on UserVoice. This code has been thoroughly tested and running stable on St. Petersburg College servers for many, many moons.

Bon Appetit!

issue.title: Return default ip address for command line invokation

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
I ran into the warning `Undefined index: REMOTE_ADDR in Input.php` when I invoked a controller's method from the command line, e.g. `php index.php mycontroller/myfunction`

My proposed solution simply returns the default localhost ip address `127.0.0.1` when the php process is cli.

issue.title: Remove inline style from hidden fields

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
I propose to remove the inline style "display:none" for hidden form fields.
1. I know of no browser that actually displays hidden form fields, so setting the style is redundant.
2. I can not imagine situations where developers rely on this style being present.
3. It generates an error when inline styles are disabled in a CSP header.

3 is my main reason for removing the style.

issue.title: Error in codeigniter's Output.php file (system/core/Output.php)

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
**Error: Message: str_replace(): Passing null to parameter #3 ($output) of type array|string is deprecated**

You need to replace at line no. 457 in system/core/Output.php

`$output = str_replace(array('{elapsed_time}', '{memory_usage}'), array($elapsed, $memory), $output); `

with this
`
$output = $output ? str_replace(array('{elapsed_time}', '{memory_usage}'), array($elapsed, $memory), $output): ""; `

repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.title: Codeigniter 3.1.4 and PHP 8.1

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
I am getting several error messages while running my script. By far, I am not an expert but I am not able to fix it. It seems like an issue due to PHP 8.1 for me.

Severity:    8192
Message:     str_replace(): Passing null to parameter #3 ($subject) of type array|string is deprecated
